sentence.Network_en: I defy anyone to disprove the defendant's statements.
sentence.Network_cn: 我倒要看看有没有人能对被告的陈述进行反驳.

sentence.Network_en: They accepted what he had said in default of any evidence to disprove it.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于没有相反的证据,他们相信了他的话.

sentence.Network_en: The statistics to prove or disprove his hypothesis will take years to collect.
sentence.Network_cn: 收集数据来证明他的假设是否成立要花上数年的时间。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... disapprove v 不赞成 disprove v 证明为假，反证 reprove v 责备，训诫.
2012职称英语模拟试题讲义_百度文库 ... 6. He demolished 推翻） A. disproved 反驳） 反驳） C. accepted 接收，承认） 接收，承认…
Smart词汇记忆组群(1-22)_在线英语听力室 ... probability n. 可能性，概率 disprove v. 反驳，驳斥，证明……有误 affirm vt. 断言.
disport 嬉戏，娱乐disprove 证明为误，反驳-

list.abs: You cannot disprove that ., 你不能否认这一点.
Wiles and / or they must first disprove Jiang Chun - xuan ' s prove of FLT published in early 1992 !, 怀尔斯和 / 或他们必须首先否定蒋春暄 1992年初发表的对费马大定理的证明!
An example that refutes or disproves a hypothesis , proposition , or theorem ., 反例证对某种假设 , 命题或定理进行反驳或推翻的例子.
individual weather events , from heatwaves to big freezes , cannot be used either to prove or disprove climate change .单个气象事件，从热浪来袭到大寒潮，不能用来证明或是否认气候变化。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French desprover

entry.def: To disprove an idea, belief, or theory means to show that it is not true.

example.ex: The statistics to prove or disprove his hypothesis will take years to collect.
example.tran: 收集数据来证明他的假设是否成立要花上数年的时间。

auth_sentence.content: Same is true when they try to disprove others.
auth_sentence.res_content: Same is true when they try to disprove others.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Same is true when they try to disprove others.

auth_sentence.content: So trying to discredit or disprove it means nothing.
auth_sentence.res_content: So trying to discredit or disprove it means nothing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So trying to discredit or disprove it means nothing.

auth_sentence.content: When you refute a proposition, you disprove it.
auth_sentence.res_content: When you refute a proposition, you disprove it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When you refute a proposition, you disprove it.

stems_affixes.word_buile: approve赞成,赞许,同意+al表名词→n.批准,通过;赞成,同意
improve[v.改善, 改进]+ment表名词→n.改进,进步

stems_affixes.value_cn: 证据, 试验, 考验
stems_affixes.word_buile: proof=prov测试,证明→n.&v.证据, 试验, 考验

stems_affixes.value_cn: [of]赞成,赞许,同意;批准,审议,通过
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强+prov测试,证明+e→证明可行
dis不+approve赞成,赞许,同意→v.不赞成,不同意[批准]
dis不+prov测试,证明+e→v.证明…不正确,反证
im进入+prove检验, 考验→进入试验→改善, 改进

stems_affixes.value_cn: 证明, 证实, 检验, 考验
stems_affixes.word_buile: prov测试,证明+e→v.证明, 证实, 检验, 考验 v.原来[是], 证明[是]
re反+prov测试,证明+e→反[别人]证明→责骂

sentences.en: I defy anyone to disprove the defendant’s statements.
sentences.cn: 我倒要看看有没有人能对被告的陈述进行反驳。

sentences.en: They accepted what he had said in default of any evidence to disprove it.
sentences.cn: 由于没有相反的证据,他们相信了他的话。

sentences.en: This discovery disproved the idea that the world was flat.
sentences.cn: 这个发现驳斥了地球是扁平的看法。
